triples.name: Explainable artificial intelligence
triples.relevance: The core subject of the survey, covering methods that provide intellectual oversight over AI algorithms.

triples.name: Artificial intelligence
triples.relevance: The foundational field in which XAI operates, providing the algorithms and systems being explained.

triples.name: Argumentation framework
triples.relevance: The formal computational models used to structure argumentative explanations in XAI approaches.

triples.name: Argument technology
triples.relevance: The computational techniques applied to create and analyze argumentative explanations for AI decisions.

triples.name: Argumentation theory
triples.relevance: The theoretical foundation for understanding dialectical reasoning in argumentative XAI approaches.
